modalContent.carpetDesc: Our professional carpet cleaning includes comprehensive cleaning using top-quality equipment and safe cleaning agents.
modalContent.carpetDetailProcess2: Mechanical dusting to remove all dry dirt.
modalContent.carpetDetailProcess4: Main wash to thoroughly clean the entire carpet on every side.
modalContent.carpetDetailProcess5: Spinning to remove nearly 95% of the water.
modalContent.carpetDetailProcess7: Final treatment, including a thorough inspection and repair of any carpet damage.
modalContent.carpetDetailProcess8: Packaging and delivery of the clean carpet.
modalContent.floorDesc: Rug and lining cleaning is a service especially dedicated to offices, hotels, and other public spaces where the lining is subject to intensive use.
modalContent.floorProcess4: Extraction cleaning with deep dirt removal
modalContent.furnitureDesc: We offer comprehensive upholstery cleaning services, restoring freshness to furniture and extending its lifespan.
modalContent.furnitureProcess1: Thorough vacuuming with a specialized vacuum cleaner
modalContent.furnitureProcess2: Application of detergent tailored to the fabric type
modalContent.paverDesc: We specialize in professional cleaning of paving stones, terrace tiles, and other external surfaces, restoring their fresh appearance.
modalContent.paverProcess1: Removal of loose dirt and weeds
modalContent.paverProcess3: Surface cleaning with a high-pressure washer
modalContent.tileDesc: Our tile cleaning services include comprehensive cleaning of surfaces both inside and outside buildings.
modalContent.pricingNote: * Prices may vary depending on the degree of soiling, type of material, and surface size. For an accurate quote, please contact us.

aboutPage.title: About Our Company
aboutPage.subtitle: Get to know us better and find out why you should trust us.
aboutPage.ourStoryPara1: SUPER PUCUŚ was born out of a passion for cleanliness and order. From the very beginning, our goal was to provide customers with professional services at the highest level, restoring shine and freshness to their homes and offices.
aboutPage.ourStoryPara2: Over the years, we have gained valuable experience that allows us to take on even the most challenging cleaning tasks. We are constantly developing, investing in modern equipment and professional preparations to meet the growing demands of our customers.
aboutPage.ourStoryPara3: Today, SUPER PUCUŚ is a team of experienced specialists who approach each order with commitment, regardless of its scale.
aboutPage.missionStatement: Our mission is to restore freshness and cleanliness to our customers' homes and workplaces, while caring for the natural environment and user safety.
aboutPage.value1Desc: We strive for perfection in every aspect of our work, from a professional approach to the customer to the final cleaning effect.
aboutPage.value2Desc: We measure the success of our company by customer satisfaction. We always listen to their needs and expectations, trying to meet them.
aboutPage.value3Desc: We act responsibly, caring for the environment and customer safety by using ecological preparations and modern technologies.
aboutPage.advantage1Desc: We have many years of experience in the cleaning industry, which allows us to effectively deal with even the most demanding dirt.
aboutPage.advantage2Desc: We come to the customer with our own equipment and cleaning agents. We adapt to the individual needs and schedule of the customer.
aboutPage.advantage3Desc: We offer a wide range of cleaning services for homes, apartments, offices, and other spaces. Everything in one place, without the need to look for different contractors.
aboutPage.advantage4Desc: We provide an attractive quality-to-price ratio. For regular customers and larger orders, we offer favorable discounts.
aboutPage.certificationDesc: In our work, we use proven methods and professional preparations that guarantee effective cleaning without the risk of damaging fabrics or other surfaces.
aboutPage.cert1Desc: We use only preparations that have the necessary approvals and safety certificates, which are effective and at the same time safe for people and animals.
aboutPage.cert2Desc: Our team regularly participates in training to stay up-to-date with the latest cleaning technologies and methods.
aboutPage.certificationNote: The quality of our services is confirmed by customer satisfaction and positive opinions, which you can find on our social media profiles.

realizacjePage.title: Our Projects
realizacjePage.subtitle: See for yourself the quality of our services. Below we present photos before and after our work.
realizacjePage.introText: In the gallery, we present selected examples of our projects that best show the effects of our work. Before and after photos allow you to assess the effectiveness of the cleaning methods we use.
realizacjePage.carpetDesc: Carpets are extremely difficult elements of home furnishings to clean. They absorb dust, mites, and are also exposed to stains and dirt. Our professional cleaning restores their freshness and original appearance.
realizacjePage.floorDesc: Linings in offices, hotels, or homes are often exposed to intensive use. Our cleaning services effectively remove deeply embedded dirt, restoring an aesthetic appearance to the linings.
realizacjePage.furnitureDesc: Upholstered furniture requires a specialized approach during cleaning. We select appropriate preparations and techniques to effectively remove dirt without damaging the material.
realizacjePage.paverDesc: External surfaces such as paving stones or terrace tiles are exposed to atmospheric factors, which leads to moss growth, stains, and dirt. Our services restore their original appearance.
realizacjePage.selectCategory: Select a category to see our work.
realizacjePage.testimonial1: I am very pleased with the upholstery cleaning service. Coffee stains that seemed impossible to remove are completely gone. My sofa looks like new!
realizacjePage.testimonial2: Professional paving stone washing service. The driveway looked terrible, overgrown with moss and dirty. Now it looks like new. I recommend!
realizacjePage.testimonial3: SUPER PUCUŚ is a company worth recommending. The carpet looks like new after cleaning, and the smell is fresh and pleasant. I will definitely use their services again.

equipmentPage.title: Our Professional Equipment
equipmentPage.subtitle: Discover the technology we use to restore cleanliness and freshness.
equipmentPage.mainEquipmentDesc: In our daily work, we use only professional equipment from renowned manufacturers, which guarantees the highest quality of cleaning services.
equipmentPage.productsDesc: We use high-quality, professional preparations that are effective in removing dirt and at the same time safe for cleaned surfaces, people, and pets.
equipmentPage.productsNote: All preparations we use have the necessary approvals and safety certificates. We adapt cleaning agents to the type of material, degree of soiling, and individual customer needs (e.g., allergy sufferers, children, pets).
equipmentPage.approachPara1: At SUPER PUCUŚ, we believe that effective cleaning is a combination of appropriate equipment, professional agents, and expert knowledge. We treat each order individually, selecting the optimal cleaning method.
equipmentPage.approachPara2: Before starting the actual washing or cleaning, we conduct a thorough analysis of the surface, assessing the type of material, degree of soiling, and possible difficulties. This allows us to propose the most effective cleaning method.
equipmentPage.approachPoint1: We use only proven cleaning techniques, adapted to specific surfaces
equipmentPage.approachPoint2: We regularly service our equipment to ensure its reliability and effectiveness
equipmentPage.approachPoint3: We invest in the latest technologies to meet the growing market demands

karcher_puzzi_10_1.name: Kärcher Puzzi 10/1
karcher_puzzi_10_1.description: Professional extractor for cleaning carpets, rugs, and upholstery. Provides deep cleaning, effectively removing even the toughest dirt.
karcher_puzzi_10_1.feature2: Suction power: 1250 W ensuring fast and effective moisture extraction
karcher_puzzi_10_1.feature3: Hot water system increasing cleaning effectiveness

viper_lsu375.name: Viper LSU 375 Industrial Vacuum Cleaner
viper_lsu375.description: Powerful industrial vacuum cleaner with three motors, designed for intensive collection of dry and wet contaminants on large surfaces.
viper_lsu375.feature1: Three independent suction motors for maximum power.
viper_lsu375.feature3: Solid construction and ease of maneuverability.

cleansystem_duster.name: Clean-System Mechanical Duster
cleansystem_duster.description: Automatic mechanical duster for carpets, effectively removing dust, sand, and other dry dirt before the main washing.
cleansystem_duster.feature1: High efficiency in removing loose contaminants.
cleansystem_duster.feature3: Prepares the carpet for deep cleaning.

rimpar_spinner.name: Rimpar Carpet Spinner
rimpar_spinner.description: Professional carpet spinner that almost completely (up to 95%) dries the carpet after washing, minimizing drying time and preventing streaks.
rimpar_spinner.feature2: Significant reduction in carpet drying time.

viper_ls160.name: Viper LS 160 Carpet Scrubber
viper_ls160.description: Single-disc scrubber designed for in-depth cleaning of carpets and rugs, effectively removing stubborn dirt.
viper_ls160.feature2: Can be used with various types of brushes and pads.
viper_ls160.feature3: Improves the appearance and hygiene of carpets.

warmtek_op50.name: Warmtek OP-50 Dehumidifier
warmtek_op50.description: Efficient air dehumidifier, accelerating the drying process of carpets and upholstery, especially in rooms with limited ventilation.

nilfisk_premium200.name: Nilfisk Premium 200-15 EU Pressure Washer
nilfisk_premium200.description: Powerful high-pressure washer for cleaning paving stones, facades, terraces, and other hard outdoor surfaces.
nilfisk_premium200.feature1: Maximum pressure of 200 bar for effective dirt removal.
nilfisk_premium200.feature3: Wide range of accessories for various applications.

heaters_fans.name: Heaters and Fans
heaters_fans.description: Professional heaters and fans supporting the drying process of carpets and upholstery, especially on colder days or in rooms with poor air circulation.
heaters_fans.feature3: Enable work in various temperature conditions.

carpet_rack.name: Carpet Racks
carpet_rack.description: Specialized racks for proper drying of carpets after washing, ensuring air circulation and preventing deformation.
carpet_rack.feature1: Allows for even drying of carpets.
carpet_rack.feature2: Prevents creasing and deformation of carpets.
carpet_rack.feature3: Optimizes space in the drying room.

dacia_transport.name: Car Transport (Dacia)
dacia_transport.description: Reliable transport (Dacia) for carrying equipment and carpets to and from the customer, ensuring mobility and timely services.
dacia_transport.feature1: Spacious and adapted for carrying cleaning equipment.
dacia_transport.feature3: Ensures safe transport of carpets and equipment.

product2.name: Solution World of Clean Blaze
product2.usage: Removing tough stains from carpets and upholstery

contactPage.title: Contact Us
contactPage.subtitle: We are available to answer your questions and help you choose the best service.
contactPage.scanQR: Scan the QR code with your phone to quickly add a company review on Google.

contactPage.locationDesc: We provide services in Radom and surrounding areas within a radius of up to 30 km.
contactPage.locationDesc1: (SUPER PUCUŚ company office; the laundry is located near Radom).
contactPage.faq1Question: How long does it take for a carpet or upholstery to dry after cleaning?
contactPage.faq1Answer: Drying time depends on many factors, such as the type of material, thickness of the carpet or upholstery, air temperature, and humidity. Typically, a carpet dries in 6 to 12 hours, and upholstery in 2 to 6 hours. Thanks to modern extraction equipment that removes most of the moisture, drying time is significantly shorter than with traditional cleaning methods.
contactPage.faq2Question: Do you remove all types of stains?
contactPage.faq2Answer: We can completely remove most common stains or significantly reduce their visibility. The effectiveness of stain removal depends on many factors: the type of stain, the time since it occurred, the type of material, and previous cleaning attempts. Some stains (e.g., paint, dyes, rust) may be difficult or impossible to remove completely. We always inform the customer about the possibilities before starting work.
contactPage.faq3Question: Can I stay in the apartment during cleaning?
contactPage.faq3Answer: Yes, you can stay in the apartment while the service is being performed. We use safe, professional cleaning agents that do not emit harmful fumes. However, we recommend limiting the use of cleaned furniture and rooms during the drying time of carpets or upholstery to speed up the drying process and avoid re-soiling.
contactPage.faq4Question: Do you provide a free quote?
contactPage.faq4Answer: Yes, we offer a free service quote. We can provide a quote by phone or email based on the information and photos provided. For more complex orders, we come to the site to make an accurate assessment and propose the best solution.

termsPage.title: Terms of Service
termsPage.subtitle: Please familiarize yourself with the terms of use of our services.
termsPage.section1Para1: These regulations define the rules for the provision of services by SUPER PUCUŚ, based in Radom, hereinafter referred to as the Contractor, to individual and corporate Clients, hereinafter referred to as Principals.
termsPage.section1Para2: Placing an order for a service means acceptance of these regulations.
termsPage.section1Para3: In matters not regulated by these regulations, the provisions of the Civil Code and other relevant provisions of Polish law shall apply.
termsPage.section2Para1: The Contractor provides services for cleaning carpets, rugs, upholstery, car upholstery, and washing paving stones, tiles, and other surfaces. Services are performed using professional equipment and cleaning agents.
termsPage.section2List1: Services are provided based on an order placed by phone, e-mail, or through the contact form.
termsPage.section2List2: The service execution date is agreed individually with the Principal.
termsPage.section2List3: The Contractor reserves the right to change the service execution date for reasons beyond their control, notifying the Principal thereof.
termsPage.section2List4: In the event of cancellation of the service on the day of its execution, the Contractor may charge the Principal for travel costs.
termsPage.section2Para2: The Contractor undertakes to make every effort to ensure that the service is performed in accordance with the highest quality standards.
termsPage.section3Para1: Service prices are determined individually, depending on the type, scope of work, and degree of soiling of the cleaned surfaces.
termsPage.section3Para2: The quote provided to the Principal before the service is performed is indicative and may change after a detailed assessment at the service execution site.
termsPage.section3Para3: Payment for the service is made immediately after its completion, in cash or by bank transfer to the Contractor's bank account within the period specified on the invoice.
termsPage.section4Para1: For the proper execution of the service, the Principal is obliged to:
termsPage.section4List1: Provide access to the cleaned surfaces and elements.
termsPage.section4List2: Provide access to water and electricity (for services performed at the Principal's premises).
termsPage.section4List3: Inform the Contractor about any unusual soiling, damage, and specifics of the materials to be cleaned.
termsPage.section4List4: Secure delicate or valuable items located in the service execution area.
termsPage.section5Para1: The Contractor provides a quality guarantee for the performed services for a period of 7 days from the date of service execution.
termsPage.section5Para2: Complaints should be reported immediately after noticing defects, no later than 7 days from the date of service execution. The complaint should be reported by phone or e-mail and include a description of the defects.
termsPage.section5Para3: The Contractor is not liable for damage resulting from previous improper cleaning or maintenance by the Principal, nor for stains that cannot be removed using available cleaning agents and methods.
termsPage.section6Para1: The Contractor reserves the right to change these regulations. Changes come into force on the day of publication on the website.
termsPage.section6Para2: Any disputes arising from the provision of services will be resolved amicably, and in the absence of agreement, by the court competent for the Contractor's registered office.
termsPage.section7Para1: The administrator of Principals' personal data is SUPER PUCUŚ, based in Radom.
termsPage.section7Para2: Principals' personal data are processed for the purpose of:
termsPage.section7List3: contact in matters related to the execution of the service.
termsPage.section7Para3: The Principal has the right to access their data, rectify it, delete it, limit its processing, and the right to object to its processing.
termsPage.contactText: If you have any questions or concerns regarding the regulations, please contact us:

privacy.subtitle: How we protect your data and care for your privacy
privacy.metaDescription: Read the privacy policy of SUPER PUCUŚ. Information on personal data processing and the use of cookies.
privacy.title: Privacy Policy

section1.title: General Information
section1.content: This Privacy Policy defines the rules for processing and protecting personal data provided by Users in connection with the use of the SUPER PUCUŚ website. The administrator of personal data is SUPER PUCUŚ, based in Radom.

section2.title: Personal Data
section2.content: The Administrator collects information provided voluntarily by the user in the contact form. Personal data are processed for the purpose of providing services by the Administrator and for marketing purposes. Everyone has the right to access their data and correct it.

section3.title: Cookies
section3.content: The SUPER PUCUŚ website uses cookies to ensure its proper functioning and for statistical purposes. Cookies are small text files sent by the server and stored on the user's end device.

section4.title: User Rights
section4.item1: The right to access data and receive a copy of it
section4.item2: The right to rectify (correct) your data

section5.title: Data Security
section5.content: The Administrator makes every effort to protect Users' personal data against unauthorized access, alteration, disclosure, or destruction. Data is protected by appropriate technical and organizational measures.

section6.title: Changes to the Privacy Policy
section6.content: The Administrator reserves the right to change the website's privacy policy, which may be caused by the development of internet technology, possible changes in the law regarding personal data protection, and the development of the website.
